I came to know my family by growing up with them.
i only eat at restaurants.
i have the support of my whole family.
I'm not married, but I have a fitness tracker that helps me stay motivated and track my progress.
My first major purchase was my laptop, and I still use it every day.

participant_2.background:
I've been with my girlfriend Luis for almost a year.
my favorite food is a burger.
I'm looking for a place to live that is close to the Y so I can continue my swimming routine.
i listen to death metal.
i m constantly making short films with the camcorder my parents got me.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
I'm doing great, thanks! I just got done swimming at the Y.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love to swim, but I haven't been in a while.
You should come with me sometime! I'm always looking for new swimming buddies.
I'd love to! I'm actually looking for a place to live, and I was hoping you could give me some advice.
Sure, what are you looking for in a place?
I'm looking for a place that's close to the Y, so I can keep up my swimming routine.
I know a great place that's close to the Y. It's called the Parkside Apartments.
Oh, I've heard of that place! Is it nice?
It's really nice! The apartments are spacious and well-maintained. And the location is perfect.
That sounds perfect! I'll definitely check it out.
Great! I hope you like it.
